ValidationRule.description: Validation rule will trigger when "Eligible" is populated in the CCB Eligibility field and anyone except Loyalty users attempt to edit.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(CCB_Eligibility__c,"Eligible"), NOT(ISNEW()), OR(ISCHANGED(MailingAddress), ISCHANGED(Email)),
NOT( OR($Profile.Name = 'Loyalty', $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name = 'Integration User', $User.Id = "0053w000009M7mN", $User.Id = "0053w000007x4rB") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the email address or mailing address of a contact that is currently eligible for Contractor Cash Back. To change the address, please click the "Submit for Approval" button and enter the new address in the comments.
